column1: Percentage of children ages 0–17 with current asthma by sex and race/ethnicity, 2001–2013
‡ Data do not meet the National Center for Health Statistics standard of statistical reliability.

NOTE: Current asthma is based on parent responses to the following questions: "Has a doctor or other health professional ever told you that your child had asthma?" and "Does your child still have asthma?".
SOURCE: National Center for Health Statistics, National Health Interview Survey.
